channel.title: Python on Bridge for us
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Bridge for us

item.title: Python常查问题
PythonBugFlow
item.description: 基础问题 1. AttributeError: module ‘XXX’ has no attribute ‘XXX’ 原因：一般情况下可能是因为拼写错误导致的改模块下确实没有对应的attribute。但还有另外一种情况是当前运行的python文件目录下有和此module模块重名的python文件，导致运行的python文件优先import了当前目录下的对应文件，所以不存在对应的attribute 解决办法：检查拼写错误或者改变文件名即可 2. bug File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pyreadline\lineeditor\history.py", line 82, in read_history_file for line in open(filename, 'r'): ... UnicodeDecodeError: 'charmap' codec can't decode byte 0x81 in position 991: character maps to <undefined> 原因：一般是因为打开python的history file时遇到了编码错误 解决办法：删除位于%userprofile%/.python_history的history文件 TensorFlow 1. TypeError: Unexpected keyword argument passed to optimizer: name Traceback (most recent call last): File "visualizing_the_convnet.py", line 3, in <module> model = load_model('cats_and_dogs_small_2.
